thread.title: caroline beynon
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by caroline beynon

author: caroline beynon
title: caroline beynon
text: This is a very smart jacket however the sleeves are massive ! Too long and wide I have sent it to a Tailor to have the sleeves shortened and taken in I only kept it because I bought it when it was on offer
